content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2022 NHL All-Star Packages

Roadtrips’ 2022 NHL All-Star Packages are fully customizable so you can enjoy your ideal weekend of hockey. Join us in sunny Las Vegas, a great place to escape the winter weather, for this fun-filled weekend of everything hockey. NHL All-Star Weekend is the perfect opportunity to see hockey’s superstars in a fun environment that showcases their personalities as well as their talent. In 2022, the NHL’s top players will use NHL All-Star weekend to sharpen their skills in Vegas before they fly off to Beijing for the 2022 Winter Games. Our hockey experts can help you plan out your ultimate NHL All-Star experience with first class accommodations on the strip, prime seating in T-Mobile Arena, and any other extras you want to include to enhance your experience. Complete 2022 NHL All-Star Weekend packages available from $3,535 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 NHL All-Star Game

The NHL All-Star Game heads to Las Vegas for the first time in 2022. Needing little introduction, Las Vegas boasts impressive restaurants, endless shopping, and of course, legendary entertainment. This exciting event begins on Friday with the NHL Skills Competition, culminating with the big game on Saturday. NHL All-Star weekend is a must-do for any hockey fan and this year is the perfect year to attend. Join the best of the best in the sport as they converge in Las Vegas for one of the most entertaining weekends in hockey.
